author: brane
msg: More work on issue #531: Fixing yet another bug in the delta combiner.
a context struct.  Only set the composite's sview_len to 0 if the source
window was NULL, otherwise svn_txdelta_apply won't read enough source
data from the stream after a handling a trivially composable window.
Update target_offset after every emitted instruction.
for change in the prototype of svn_txdelta__compose_windows.
